name: fa_applet

name: formulaAppletPhysics

description:
Check if result is a physical quantity (value and unit).
Uncheck if result is a mathematical expression.

label: Automatic/Manual Mode
description: Result is computed automatically or is given by the author.

options.label: Result is computed by the Formula Applet
Input result is compared with a given result

label: Formula Applet Id
name: id
description: Id of the Formula Applet - has to be unique
